events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I am unhappy with its quality.
The report has been reviewed and the issue is categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to this case to handle the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you’re not satisfied with your purchase. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for requesting a refund so I can assist you better?
My order number is 123456789. The product is not as described, and it doesn’t function as I expected. I would like a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately. Please allow 5-7 business days for the refund to reflect in your account.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and will wait for the refund to be processed.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us anytime.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As we have not received any further issues from you, this case is now closed. Thank you for contacting our support services.
